pageContent: Background: Patients following radical prostatectomy will encounter various symptoms that may vary depending on the recovery of surgery and the use of adjuvant treatments. However, few studies have used the scale developed for prostate cancer to longitudinally assess the course of symptoms in Chinese patients. This study aimed to identify the symptom trajectories and the influencing factors in the prostate cancer patients of our area.

metaData.source:
Sexual dysfunction after radical radiation therapy for prostate cancer: a prospective evaluation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10414738/
